ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] DELETE container?

S. Alexander Jacobson wrote:

>I think the general question here is what are the
>standard ReST semantics for container.
>
<pedantic>
I don't disagree with the intent of the question, but shouldnt the 
question really be "what are the standard _HTTP_ semantics for a 
container?"  As far as I know, REST (as described in Fielding's thesis) 
says nothing about the concept of containers; it only talks about 
resources in general.  (The closest it comes is a statement that a 
resource may be a collection of other resources).
</pedantic>

--Chuck
